sentences.en: But even before this week's scandal, some donors appeared stand - offish.
sentences.cn: 但是,即便在本周的丑闻之前, 一些捐助国也开始显得疏远.

sentences.en: He can be quite stand-offish and rude, even to his friends.
sentences.cn: 他有时会很冷淡，很粗鲁，甚至对自己的朋友也是如此。

sentences.en: People who seem stand - offish are in reality often simply nervous.
sentences.cn: 那些看上去泰然自若的人实际上往往是很紧张的.

sentences.en: She's not fond of him - quite offish and quite careless.
sentences.cn: 她并不喜欢他 ― 对他相当冷淡,完全不挂在心上.

sentences.en: The deepest emotion is often embodied in an offish way.
sentences.cn: 最深沉的感情，往往以最冷漠的方式表达出来。

sentences.en: There are a lot offish and crabs in it.

words.tran_cn: 冷漠的；不亲热的；疏远的
